name: Karaoke Revolution Presents: American Idol Encore 2
name_original: Karaoke Revolution Presents: American Idol Encore 2
description: Live out your dream as a singing sensation with Karaoke Revolution® Presents: American Idol® Encore 2! Play with friends and family to compete in front of all three American Idol judges and sing your way to stardom. Tailor your game experience with 40 new hit songs, all-new venues and enhanced and customizable characters. Are you ready to be the next American Idol?
